text:
let's bump this.

Update me please when you get a response.

I've completed my task in a suboptimal way because of the deadlines, but would see this one trough
Update.  HS says their documentation should *not* say that it is available for ANY of the 3 hubs. It is meant to be included only in Content Hub Enterprise :disappointed:

Thank you for the update <@U06441ELMEU>

Sad to hear it, but at least it is settled.

Hello there.

I am trying to add the Mapbox View Nearby Companies project to our HubSpot account. I initially tested it in our sandbox environment, so now I want to move it to our production environment. While it worked fine in our sandbox account, in our production account I am unable to add the MAPBOX_ACCESS_TOKEN as a secret. I get the error that the secret was not added with no rhyme or reason why. I tried asking the main HubSpot support forum and I did not get any response. There is also nothing about this particular error on the entire world wide web, so this must be something very obscure.
Having same issue. I cannot add or list secrets using the hs cli.
It seems I can add secrets to prod but not sandbox.
I am using CMS Hub Enterprise, it was working on Friday, not on Monday (and yes the client has paid the bill)

Hello everyone,
when we create a secrets and save it `hs secrets update <secret-name>`  we do it in local and do our development(serverless function) and deploy into HubSpot.
Now if we have to rotate the secrets, client can't setup everything in local and do the deployment.
How do we make it easier for private app key rotation easier for serverless function.
